channel.title: Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Milanjovanovic.tech on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Complete Guide to Amazon SQS and Amazon SNS With MassTransit
item.description: In this article, we'll explore how to use Amazon SQS and SNS for asynchronous messaging in .NET applications. We'll also see how MassTransit simplifies the process, enabling you to build robust message-driven systems. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/complete-guide-to-amazon-sqs-and-amazon-sns-with-masstransit

item.title: 5 EF Core Features You Need To Know
item.description: EF Core is powerful, and knowing a few key features can save you lots of time and frustration. I've cherry-picked five essential features that you really need to know. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/5-ef-core-features-you-need-to-know
